bin/require.py

00001 #! /usr/bin/env python
00002 
00003 
00004 import glob, time, os, sys
00005 import argparse
00006 
00007 #directory paths
00008 testdirectory = "../tests/"
00009 resultsdirectory = "../results/"
00010 outputdirectory = "../outputs/"
00011 
00012 parser = argparse.ArgumentParser()
00013 parser.add_argument('potential',nargs='?', help='The first argument is the potential')
00014 parser.add_argument('element',nargs='?', help='The second argument is the element')
00015 parser.add_argument('test',nargs='?', help='Require the result of this test')
00016 
00017 args = parser.parse_args()
00018 
00019 potential = args.potential
00020 element = args.element
00021 testname = args.test
00022 
00023 resultfilename = testname + '.' + potential + '.' + element + '.xml'
00024 resultfilepath = resultsdirectory + resultfilename
00025 err = 0
00026 try:
00027     fob = open(resultfilepath)
00028     #print "Test configuation for %s already exists..." % resultfilename
00029 except IOError:
00030     import pipeline
00031     err = pipeline.runTest(testdirectory+testname+'.py',potential,element,verbose=False)  
00032 
00033 if err == 0:
00034     file = open(resultfilepath, 'r')
00035     print "".join(file.readlines())
00036     file.close()
00037 import sys
00038 sys.exit(err)
